title: 820-3435 liquid damaged
message:
This board came in with no light on charger. Liquid at U7090, which I replaced and 3.4v came back. PPBUS = 8.6. More liquid at R7180, replaced and C7400 and C7425, resoldered U7400 as pin 12 had a tiny bit of corrosion on it.

The boards now gets green and orange light, I have 3.3v and a 5.1v pulse at C7518. PPVRTC = 3.3v. On U6100 I got 3.3v and area looks clean. U1950 has 3.4v and all_sys_pwrgd pulses at 3.3v but goes to 0. CPU Vcore also pulses. I cannot find any shorts. I did replace U7501 but situation is the same. U1900 has 32mhz clock. Ideas?

title: 820-3435 liquid damaged
message:
Pin3 of U1950 pulses too?
Try new BIOS clean ME.
And check for corroded component, or trace.
Put good flux and heat SMC and CPU; no more than 180-200 degrees.
You may need to ultrasonic too.

title: 820-3435 liquid damaged
message: What tool would you recommend for cleaning ROM ME region?
